page.title: 13Family Life
page.content: {The next 3 pages contain details of {home life seen through the eyes of 2 {eleven year old children.} This is a description of a typical school day written by a girl whose parents both work. ***************** I usually get up at 7 a.m. and then wake my mam and dad.Then I get washed and dressed.After I have made and eaten my breakfast I pack my school bag, not forgetting my lunchtime sandwiches.At about 8.20 I start walking to school.My mam and dad leave for work at 8.30.School starts at 9 a.m. and ends at 4 pm.I get home from school about 4.10 and my dad usually comes in 5 minutes after me.I spend my time watching T.V. or playing in the garden until my mam gets home at about 5.45.Then I usually talk to her as she fills in forms connected with work.
